ModMetaData.name: Tiered Grow Lights
ModMetaData.author: SevereMods
ModMetaData.description:
Adds five tiers of artificial grow lights representing real-world lighting evolution: Incandescent → Halogen → High Pressure Sodium → LED Mk I → Advanced LED Array.
Each tier progressively improves light radius and energy efficiency, while generating heat proportional to its inefficiency. Earlier lamps run hot; LED tiers run cool. Unlocked through a dedicated five-stage research chain.
No DLC required. No Harmony patches.
